1   package org.lindbergframework.core.configuration;
2   
3   import java.io.File;
4   import java.io.InputStream;
5   import java.net.URL;
6   
7   import org.apache.commons.lang.StringUtils;
8   import org.lindbergframework.beans.di.context.BeanFactory;
9   import org.lindbergframework.beans.util.BeanUtil;
10  import org.lindbergframework.core.context.xml.util.XmlUtil;
11  import org.lindbergframework.exception.BeanException;
12  import org.lindbergframework.exception.CoreConfigurationException;
13  import org.lindbergframework.exception.InvalidConfigurationException;
14  import org.lindbergframework.exception.InvalidXmlDocumentException;
15  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.configuration.LinpConfiguration;
16  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.configuration.XmlLinpConfiguration;
17  import org.lindbergframework.persistence.configuration.XmlLinpConfigurationInitializer;
18  import org.lindbergframework.schema.TconfigProperty;
19  import org.lindbergframework.schema.LindbergConfigurationDocument.LindbergConfiguration;
20  import org.lindbergframework.schema.LindbergConfigurationDocument.LindbergConfiguration.Core;
21  import org.lindbergframework.schema.LindbergConfigurationDocument.LindbergConfiguration.Linp;
22  import org.lindbergframework.schema.LindbergConfigurationDocument.LindbergConfiguration.Linv;
23  import org.lindbergframework.validation.configuration.ValidationConfiguration;
24  import org.lindbergframework.validation.configuration.XmlValidationConfiguration;
25  import org.lindbergframework.validation.configuration.XmlValidationConfigurationInitializer;
26  
27  /**
28   * Core configuration implementation to work with xml configuration based.
29   * 
30   * The XML schema  is defined in http://www.lindbergframework.org/schema/lindberg-config.xsd
31   * 
32   * @author Victor Lindberg
33   *
34   */
35  public class XmlCoreConfiguration extends AbstractCoreConfiguration implements ConfigurationInitializer{
36      
37      /**
38       * XML Core node for this configuration.
39       */
40      private Core coreConfiguration;
41      
42      /**
43       * XML root node for this configuration.
44       */
45      private LindbergConfiguration lindbergConfiguration;
46      
47      /**
48       * Configuration properties that are automatically formatted to get bean instances, static final constantes... 
49       */
50      private static final String[] keysAutomaticallyFormatted = new String[] {CONFIG_PROPERTY_BEAN_FACTORY};
51      
52      
53      public XmlCoreConfiguration(){
54          //
55      }
56      
57      /**
58       * Create a XmlCoreConfiguration using {@link File}
59       * 
60       * @param xmlConfig configuration file.
61       */
62      public XmlCoreConfiguration(File xmlConfig){
63         initialize(xmlConfig);
64      }
65      
66      /**
67       * Create a XmlCoreConfiguration using {@link URL}
68       * 
69       * @param xmlConfig configuration URL.
70       */
71      public XmlCoreConfiguration(URL xmlConfig){
72          initialize(xmlConfig);
73      }
74      
75      /**
76       * Create a XmlCoreConfiguration using {@link InputStream}
77       * 
78       * @param xmlConfig configuration inputstream.
79       */
80      public XmlCoreConfiguration(InputStream xmlConfig){
81          initialize(xmlConfig);
82      }
83      
84      /**
85       * {@inheritDoc}
86       */
87      public void initialize(File xmlConfig){
88         loadDocument(xmlConfig);
89      }
90      
91      /**
92       * {@inheritDoc}
93       */
94      public void initialize(URL xmlConfig){
95          loadDocument(xmlConfig);
96      }
97      
98      /**
99       * {@inheritDoc}
100      */
101     public void initialize(InputStream xmlConfig){
102         loadDocument(xmlConfig);
103     }
104 
105     /**
106      * load configuration document.
107      * 
108      * @param xmlConfig configuration document.
109      */
110     private void loadDocument(Object xmlConfig) {
111         if (coreConfiguration != null)
112                throw new IllegalStateException("Lindberg Core Configuration is already initialized");
113         
114         if (xmlConfig == null)
115             throw new CoreConfigurationException(
116                     "Invalid core xmlConfig. Configuration File is Null");
117 
118         try {
119             this.lindbergConfiguration = XmlUtil.buildDocument(xmlConfig);
120             this.coreConfiguration = lindbergConfiguration.getCore();
121         } catch (Exception ex) {
122             throw new CoreConfigurationException("Loading lindberg core xml settings failed",ex);
123         }
124     }
125     
126     /**
127      * {@inheritDoc}
128      */
129     @Override
130     public BeanFactory getBeanFactory() {
131         BeanFactory beanFactoryCache = super.getBeanFactory();
132         if (beanFactoryCache != null)
133             return beanFactoryCache;
134         
135         beanFactoryCache = getPropertyValue(CONFIG_PROPERTY_BEAN_FACTORY);
136         if (beanFactoryCache == null)
137             beanFactoryCache = CoreConfiguration.DEFAULT_BEAN_FACTORY;
138         
139         String basePackage = getDIBasePackage();
140         if (basePackage == null)
141             throw new IllegalArgumentException("The basePackages property must be defined. Configure the [lindberg.core.di-basepackage] configuration property");
142         
143         beanFactoryCache.loadBasepackage(basePackage);
144         super.setBeanFactory(beanFactoryCache);
145         
146         return beanFactoryCache;
147     }
148     
149     /**
150      * {@inheritDoc}
151      */
152     @Override
153     public String getDIBasePackage() {
154         String diBasepackageCache = super.getDIBasePackage();
155         if (diBasepackageCache != null)
156             return diBasepackageCache;
157         
158         diBasepackageCache = getPropertyValue(CONFIG_PROPERTY_DI_BASEPACKAGE);
159         super.setDiBasePackage(diBasepackageCache);
160         
161         return diBasepackageCache;
162     }
163     
164     /**
165      * {@inheritDoc}
166      */
167     @Override
168     public LinpConfiguration getLinpConfiguration() {
169         LinpConfiguration linpConfigCache = super.getLinpConfiguration();
170         if (linpConfigCache != null)
171             return linpConfigCache;
172         
173         if (lindbergConfiguration.getLinp() == null)
174             return null;
175         
176         String strClassParser = getParserLinpConfig();
177         if (strClassParser == null){
178             linpConfigCache = new XmlLinpConfiguration(lindbergConfiguration.getLinp());
179         }else
180            try{
181               Class linpConfigClazz = Class.forName(strClassParser);
182               linpConfigCache = BeanUtil.createInstance(linpConfigClazz);
183               if (linpConfigCache instanceof XmlLinpConfigurationInitializer){
184                   XmlLinpConfigurationInitializer linpInitializer = (XmlLinpConfigurationInitializer) linpConfigCache;
185                   linpInitializer.initialize(lindbergConfiguration.getLinp());
186               }else
187                   throw new InvalidConfigurationException("Xml linp configuration parser does not implements XmlLinpConfigurationInitializer");
188            }catch(Exception ex){
189                throw new BeanException("Could not create Linp Configuration Parser",ex);
190            }
191         
192         super.setLinpConfiguration(linpConfigCache);
193         return linpConfigCache;
194     }
195     
196     /**
197      * {@inheritDoc}
198      */
199     @Override
200     public ValidationConfiguration getValidationConfiguration() {
201         ValidationConfiguration validConfigCache = super.getValidationConfiguration();
202         if (validConfigCache != null)
203             return validConfigCache;
204         if (lindbergConfiguration.getLinv() == null)
205             return null;
206         
207         String strClassParser = getParserValidationConfig();
208         if (strClassParser == null){
209             validConfigCache = new XmlValidationConfiguration(lindbergConfiguration.getLinv());
210         }else
211             try{
212                 Class validationConfigClazz = Class.forName(strClassParser);
213                 validConfigCache = BeanUtil.createInstance(validationConfigClazz);
214                 if (validConfigCache instanceof XmlValidationConfigurationInitializer){
215                     XmlValidationConfigurationInitializer validInitializer = (XmlValidationConfigurationInitializer) validConfigCache;
216                     validInitializer.initialize(lindbergConfiguration.getLinv());
217                 }else
218                     throw new InvalidConfigurationException("Xml validation configuration parser does not implements XmlValidationConfigurationInitializer");
219             }catch(Exception ex){
220                 throw new BeanException("Could not create Validation Configuration Parser",ex);
221             }
222             
223             super.setValidationConfiguration(validConfigCache);
224             return validConfigCache;
225     }
226 
227     /**
228      * Get the lindberg persistence configuration implementation parser.
229      * 
230      * @return lindberg persistence configuration implementation parser.
231      */
232     public String getParserLinpConfig(){
233         Linp linp = lindbergConfiguration.getLinp();
234         if (coreConfiguration != null && linp != null)
235            return linp.getParser(); 
236            
237         return null;
238     }
239     
240     public String getParserValidationConfig(){
241         Linv valid = lindbergConfiguration.getLinv();
242         if (coreConfiguration != null && valid != null)
243             return valid.getParser(); 
244         
245         return null;
246     }
247     
248     /**
249      * Get a {@link TconfigProperty} instance in this configuration for specified key.
250      * 
251      * @param key configuration property key.
252      * @return {@link TconfigProperty} instance for specified key.
253      */
254     protected TconfigProperty getPropertyFromKey(String key){
255         if (coreConfiguration != null){
256                 TconfigProperty[] properties = coreConfiguration.getConfigPropertyArray();
257                 TconfigProperty property = XmlUtil.getPropertyFromKey(key, properties);
258                 
259                 return property;
260         }
261         
262         return null;
263     }
264     
265     /**
266      * get the configuration properties array in this configuration.
267      * 
268      * @return configuration properties array in this configuration.
269      */
270     protected TconfigProperty[] getConfigProperties(){
271         return coreConfiguration.getConfigPropertyArray();
272     }
273     
274     /**
275      * {@inheritDoc}
276      */
277     public <E> E getPropertyValue(String key) {
278         E value = super.getPropertyValue(key);
279         if (value != null)
280             return value;
281         
282         TconfigProperty tconfigProperty = getPropertyFromKey(key);
283         value = XmlUtil.getPropertyValue(tconfigProperty, keysAutomaticallyFormatted);
284         
285         return value;
286     }
287     
288     /**
289      * {@inheritDoc}
290      */
291     @Override
292     public void validate() throws InvalidConfigurationException {
293         if (coreConfiguration == null)
294             return;
295         
296         if (! coreConfiguration.validate())
297            throw new InvalidXmlDocumentException("Lindberg Core XML configuration is invalid. Verify the xml configuration");
298         verifyRequiredConfigProperties();
299     }
300     
301     /**
302      * checks required core configuration properties.
303      */
304     private void verifyRequiredConfigProperties(){
305        if (StringUtils.isEmpty(getDIBasePackage()))
306            throw new InvalidXmlDocumentException("Lindberg Core XML configuration is invalid. "+CoreConfiguration.CONFIG_PROPERTY_DI_BASEPACKAGE+" core property is not defined");
307     }
308     
309 }
